body.p:
State of Kentucky
Washington County } Sct.

Stamper Ward states that at the Novmeber Term 1861 he was tried and convicted of Carrying concealed a deadly weapon; that and fined $50-00 -- He states that at the time said case was tried he was a soldier in the United States army and was then in Camp and could not attend Court of that time --
He states if he had been present at the trial he could have proven himself Justified in carrying weapons --
He prays the interposition of the Executive that the same may be remitted --
Sworn to before me by Stamper Ward May 22 1862 --

R S Peters
Clk W County Court --

To his Excellency
Beriah Magoffin --
Gov Ky --

Washington Cir Ct
$50 } Weapons
Stamper Ward
Issd May 29 1862
